CustomField.formula: IF (OR( SendToPartner__c = true, BEGINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c), "NSS"),BEGINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c), "SMB INB"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c), "Inbound-Forms")), "Submit Referral NSS" , IF (OR(CONTAINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c), "Oasis"),BEGINS(TEXT(Cadence_Type__c),"MMS SDR")), "SDR Create Meeting" , "Create Opportunity"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: On the touchpoint component, what label do we use for the Opportunity button?
CustomField.label: Create Opp Label
